title: Game Crash
body: So when I try to play a ranked game or whatever my game crashed just at the champion loading screen and then a bug report shows up and I get 5 low priority game for 20min plz Riot do something about this

replies.body: Exact same issue! During champion load out screen it loads for a little bit but then just crashes. Upvote my article and I'll upvote yours.

Yes, this happened to me as well. The game crashed and when I tried to reconnect it continually crashed. I then restarted the client and when I clicked Launch (still using the legacy client) it told me I had 'corrupted files' and underwent a patch or something of the sort. When I went back in to reconnect I found that my team had remade and I was given LeaverBuster. I don't think this is fair at all that we should be punished for something out of four control, such as clients crashing or internets disconnecting during the game, as LeaverBuster punishes all of these things.

If you see a bug splat error when the champion loading screen crashes, it could be due to outdated graphics drivers. Be sure that all your drivers are up to date. If that doesn't seem to be the issue, let's also go through each setup in our [Bug Splat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) to rule out any other possibilities.

Let me know how this works for you!
